name: FURNACE (JoyModulo)
description:
Stoke the FURNACE. 

Channel its HEAT.

Bite the serpent's tail.

[JAM VERSION]

!!! IF THE GAME WILL NOT START!!!

Try going to the config menu and hitting "clear save". If you aren't able to open the config menu, try reloading the page first. The game should run ok if you have a START button and not a CONTINUE button.
